description.@en: Inhaling deeply, you belch forth a necrotic Wind to whisk away living foes to the realm of death.

criticalFailure.@en: The ruby turns to dust in your hand, blown away by Ã†theric Winds. Today is not the day that they die and you must make an appropriate sacrifice of your own. You immediately suffer a Grievous Injury.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foes cannot Resist.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, any foes caught in its Cone Template suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage which ignores any Damage Threshold Modifier their armor may confer. You can inflict Injuries with this Magick, but they are Slain! instead. Your foes can successfully Resist with a Coordination Test.

reagents.@en: An expensive ruby held before your lips
